thread.title: Madonna's Twins Reach Peak Levels Of Cuteness In Matching Tracksuits
thread.title_full: Madonna's Twins Reach Peak Levels Of Cuteness In Matching Tracksuits

author: Jamie Feldman
title: Madonna's Twins Reach Peak Levels Of Cuteness In Matching Tracksuits
text:
Madonna's Twins Reach Peak Levels Of Cuteness In Matching Tracksuits Double the "Vogue"-worthy looks. By Jamie Feldman 
Madonna regularly makes headlines for her sartorial choices . Now, her twin daughters are adorably stealing the spotlight. 
Estere and Stelle, the 4 1/2-year-old twins Madge adopted from Malawi in early February, looked unbelievably cute wearing a pair of matching Adidas tracksuits and gold bows around their heads. A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Feb 21, 2017 at 9:20am PST 
“Today’s Blessing brought to you by Adidas!” the 58-year-old mom of six captioned the sweet photo , posted Tuesday. 
Stelle and Estere have often been seen on Madonna’s social media channels wearing matching outfits, whether it be pajamas... A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Feb 18, 2017 at 5:50pm PST 
... or heart-adorned dresses. A photo posted by Madonna (@madonna) on Feb 8, 2017 at 10:24am PST 
Whatever the pair is wearing, one thing is for sure: It’s always two times the cuteness. ALSO ON HUFFPOST
